Our Development Services

Everything you need to build your digital product

1. Web Application Development

Fast, secure, and beautiful web apps using modern technologies

What we build:

  • •Business dashboards & admin portals
  • •ERP extensions & custom modules
  • •Booking & reservation systems
  • •E-commerce websites
  • •Learning management systems

Technologies:

React, Vue, Django, Laravel, Node.js, FastAPI, Firebase, Supabase

2. Mobile App Development

Smooth, user-friendly apps for Android & iOS

What we build:

  • •Customer apps (food ordering, taxi, delivery)
  • •Business tools (POS, staff management)
  • •Community & social apps
  • •Marketplace apps
  • •Fintech & savings apps

Technologies:

Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift, Firebase

3. Custom Business Software

Workflow automation and unique internal systems

What we build:

  • •Custom POS systems
  • •HR & payroll systems
  • •Inventory & warehouse systems
  • •CRM systems
  • •Reporting & analytics dashboards

Technologies:

Full-stack development tailored to your needs

4. API Development & Integrations

Connect your tools so data flows seamlessly

What we build:

  • •Mobile ↔ Web ↔ Odoo integrations
  • •Payment gateways (M-Pesa, PayPal, Stripe)
  • •SMS & email systems
  • •ERP and CRM integrations

Technologies:

REST APIs, GraphQL, webhooks, cloud services
